comment._content:
What a coo for all of us here at flicker to be able to access such history and magnificence, I am just totally overwhelmed and grateful.
thank you  CJH for allowing us such a generous gift of love.   ~ M

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Yeshiva University Museum, one of the five Partners at the Center For Jewish History, is delighted to be able to share this photograph and other items from its collection with the flickr community.
